version.releaseNotes: - Fixed View model of Page Got duplicate Call to OnBindedViewLoad()
- Fixed ListenToEventRouterDataBehavior Not working in wpf bug. - Fixed View Factory cannot Createinstance Bug cos by removed new(vm) Constructor.
- Deleted Views new(vm) Constructor. You might need update your template and deleted your contructor dependented on this.
- Fix wrong reference clearance which might cause nullreference exception when Page Cache mode is Required.
- Try fixed behavior sdk reference to nuget package for UWP 10586.

- Added AddOrUpdateByKey and RemoveByKey to KeyedObservableCollection<TKey, TValue> - Removed ReactiveCommand.CanExecuteObserver property and added new method instead ReactiveCommand.ListenCanExecuteObservable(observable>bool<) - As Unity Finally updated it's released version, we go release.
